metadata.title: CVE-2021-47149 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:fujitsu: fix potential null-ptr-deref In fmvj18x_get_hwinfo(), if ioremapfails there will be NULL pointer deref. To fix this, check the return valueof ioremap and return -1 to the caller in case of failure.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
